version_description:
-  Improved PinPointing User Experience
-  More comprehensive settings menu, added options for user-controlled audio alerts
-  Added support for 42 weather alert types
-  Bug fixes

Overhaul of Location and Alert Management
* Ability to select multiple Push Notification Locations (Settings>Edit Locations>Press the Bell)
* Press on any location in Edit Location to rename the location (Home, Work, etc) and move the map to PinPoint the location to the specific address to get the most accurate currents, forecast and alerts

New Alert Management
* Toggle on/off individual weather alert types (Tornado Warning, Flood Warning, etc) in Settings>Weather Alert Type
* Number Badge next to the Location Name showing the total number of active Alerts

Location Management
* Press location in top bar to change, edit and add locations
* In the left menu for changing locations, press the 3 dots next to the location to edit location settings and make a location capable of receiving push notifications. More Information Available on the Map 
* Pressing on map based Alerts will show the bulletin text *Pressing on Storm Tracks outlines possible storm threats 
* Pressing on Earthquakes or Tropical Tracks provides more detail than ever before
Improved weather data source to give you accurate current conditions and forecasts from your favorite weather source!

* Added numerous ADA improvements, including text scaling, voice overs, and improved contrast.
* Implemented non-precise location radius.
* Numerous stability enhancements & bug fixes
